review: "Let's Draw!" is a fantastic game for children who enjoy drawing and coloring. The game is very engaging and easy to use, even for younger kids. The ability to animate drawings and incorporate them into mini-games is a standout feature that keeps children entertained for hours. The game is also a great value, saving on paper and art supplies. While there are limited save slots, this is a minor issue compared to the overall enjoyment and educational value it provides. Highly recommend for families with young children.
